text: James Best (July 26, 1926 - April 6, 2015) was an American actor. He is best known for his starring role as bumbling Sheriff Rosco P. Coltrane in the CBS television series The Dukes of Hazzard. He has also worked as an acting coach, artist, college professor, and musician. Best died on April 6, 2015, in Hickory, North Carolina from complications of pneumonia. He was 88.James Best, sheriff of ‘Hazzard,’ dies in Hickory at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== * * *James Best's website *James Best Bio at HazzardNet.com *James Best Crystal Reel Awards Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Infectious disease deaths in North Carolina Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American animal rights activists Category:Actors from Kentucky
title: James Best
